channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Baseball star Shohei Ohtani seeks $325,000 worth of baseball cards from his ex-interpreter
item.description: Baseball star Shohei Ohtani wants his ex-interpreter Ippei Mizuhara to hand over hundreds of thousands of dollars worth of baseball cards he says were fraudulently bought using his money.

item.title: Millions of tons of plastic foul the world around us
item.description: On a Philippines beach, barefoot children jumped and played on shoals of plastic washed ashore in previous typhoons.

item.title: Trump promised federal recognition for the Lumbee Tribe. Will he follow through?
item.description: When Kamala Harris and Donald Trump campaigned in North Carolina, both candidates courted a state-recognized tribe there whose 55,000 members could have helped tip the swing state.
